meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: LEAD: Panama Coalition Set Up Panamanian opposition parties and civic groups joined the deposed President in a ''government of national reconciliation.'' Page A3. Training to Be American A cultural orientation course at a camp in the Philippines is preparing young Vietnamese-Americans for life in the United States.
